This method returns an integer (int) value as read from the input stream.
readText() - Static method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.util.UserInput
This method returns a line of text from the standard input stream.
RedDragon - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model
RedDragon is a subclass of Characer, it inherites all the fields from the parent, also overides the attack() and defend() methods according to the rules of the game.
RedDragon() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.RedDragon
The non-args constructor, set the value for the fields when being initialized maxHealth will be 1 to 400 (inclusive, D20*D20), strength will be 2 to 40 (inclusive, 2*D20).
RedDragon(int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.RedDragon
This constructor calls the super constructor, allows specific values to be set.
report - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackReport
Contains the report detailing the defense.
reportCombat(Character, Attack, AttackReport) - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.CharacterGame
This method generates a report on how a character performed, with the combatant details, what attack they generated, how they defended.
reportEndingState(Character, Character) - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.CharacterGame
This method simply generates a report based on the statistics of the two characters passed, calling toString() on each.
reportEndOfMatch(Character, Character) - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.CharacterGame
This method generates a report suitable for display after a fight has concluded, it includes the fight outcome (winner, looser, draw), as well as each Character's state.
reportWinLoose(Character, Character) - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.CharacterGame
This method accepts two Characters, and based on their current health determines who won, who lost, or if a fight was a draw (i.e.
roll(Dice) - Static method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.util.DiceBag
the method will pass the Dice object, and return the value which will be in the range of 1 to dice.getValue(); for example, roll(Dice FOUR) will return an integer from 1-4;
runGame() - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.CharacterGame
This is the core logic of the program, it displays the characters available asks the user to enter two index values calls method fight to process the combat match heals all of the characters to full health after the combat prompts the user if they want to run another fight-match (Y/N)
